reference.title: cxxClassDeclarationFileLineStart
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxClassDeclarationFileLineStart> element specifies the beginning of the class declaration.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxClassDeclarationFileLineStart> element is defined within <cxxClassAPIItemLocation>. It contains the line number that the class declaration begins on. The element is empty but for the required attributes name and value. The attribute name must be set to "lineNumber". The attribute value is set to the line number where the class declaration begins.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxClassAPIItemLocation> <cxxClassDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="D:/include/headerfile.h"/> <cxxClassDeclarationFileLineStart name="lineNumber" value="765"/> <cxxClassDeclarationFileLineEnd name="lineNumber" value="787"/> </cxxClassAPIItemLocation>
